00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_CLASS

00039 #include <linux/version.h>
00040 #include <linux/seq_file.h>
00041 #include <asm/statfs.h>

00043 #include <obd_class.h>

00045 #include "lmv_internal.h"
00046 
00047 #ifndef CONFIG_PROC_FS
00048 static struct lprocfs_vars lprocfs_module_vars[] = { {0} };
00049 static struct lprocfs_vars lprocfs_obd_vars[] = { {0} };
00050 #else
00051 static int lmv_numobd_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00052 {
00053         struct obd_device       *dev = (struct obd_device *)m->private;
00054         struct lmv_desc         *desc;
00055 
00056         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00057         desc = &dev->u.lmv.desc;
00058         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", desc->ld_tgt_count);
00059         return 0;
00060 }
00061 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(lmv_numobd);
00062 
00063 static const char *placement_name[] = {
00064         [PLACEMENT_CHAR_POLICY] = "CHAR",
00065         [PLACEMENT_NID_POLICY]  = "NID",
00066         [PLACEMENT_INVAL_POLICY]  = "INVAL"
00067 };
00068 
00069 static placement_policy_t placement_name2policy(char *name, int len)
00070 {
00071         int                     i;
00072 
00073         for (i = 0; i < PLACEMENT_MAX_POLICY; i++) {
00074                 if (!strncmp(placement_name[i], name, len))
00075                         return i;
00076         }
00077         return PLACEMENT_INVAL_POLICY;
00078 }
00079 
00080 static const char *placement_policy2name(placement_policy_t placement)
00081 {
00082         LASSERT(placement < PLACEMENT_MAX_POLICY);
00083         return placement_name[placement];
00084 }
00085 
00086 static int lmv_placement_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00087 {
00088         struct obd_device       *dev = (struct obd_device *)m->private;
00089         struct lmv_obd          *lmv;
00090 
00091         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00092         lmv = &dev->u.lmv;
00093         seq_printf(m, "%s\n", placement_policy2name(lmv->lmv_placement));
00094         return 0;
00095 }
00096 
00097 #define MAX_POLICY_STRING_SIZE 64
00098 
00099 static ssize_t lmv_placement_seq_write(struct file *file,
00100                                        const char __user *buffer,
00101                                        size_t count, loff_t *off)
00102 {
00103         struct obd_device *dev = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00104         char                     dummy[MAX_POLICY_STRING_SIZE + 1];
00105         int                      len = count;
00106         placement_policy_t       policy;
00107         struct lmv_obd          *lmv;
00108 
00109         if (copy_from_user(dummy, buffer, MAX_POLICY_STRING_SIZE))
00110                 return -EFAULT;
00111 
00112         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00113         lmv = &dev->u.lmv;
00114 
00115         if (len > MAX_POLICY_STRING_SIZE)
00116                 len = MAX_POLICY_STRING_SIZE;
00117 
00118         if (dummy[len - 1] == '\n')
00119                 len--;
00120         dummy[len] = '\0';
00121 
00122         policy = placement_name2policy(dummy, len);
00123         if (policy != PLACEMENT_INVAL_POLICY) {
00124                 spin_lock(&lmv->lmv_lock);
00125                 lmv->lmv_placement = policy;
00126                 spin_unlock(&lmv->lmv_lock);
00127         } else {
00128                 CERROR("Invalid placement policy \"%s\"!\n", dummy);
00129                 return -EINVAL;
00130         }
00131         return count;
00132 }
00133 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(lmv_placement);
00134 
00135 static int lmv_activeobd_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00136 {
00137         struct obd_device       *dev = (struct obd_device *)m->private;
00138         struct lmv_desc         *desc;
00139 
00140         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00141         desc = &dev->u.lmv.desc;
00142         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", desc->ld_active_tgt_count);
00143         return 0;
00144 }
00145 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(lmv_activeobd);
00146 
00147 static int lmv_desc_uuid_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00148 {
00149         struct obd_device       *dev = (struct obd_device*)m->private;
00150         struct lmv_obd          *lmv;
00151 
00152         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00153         lmv = &dev->u.lmv;
00154         seq_printf(m, "%s\n", lmv->desc.ld_uuid.uuid);
00155         return 0;
00156 }
00157 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(lmv_desc_uuid);
00158 
00159 static void *lmv_tgt_seq_start(struct seq_file *p, loff_t *pos)
00160 {
00161         struct obd_device       *dev = p->private;
00162         struct lmv_obd          *lmv = &dev->u.lmv;
00163         return (*pos >= lmv->desc.ld_tgt_count) ? NULL : lmv->tgts[*pos];
00164 }
00165 
00166 static void lmv_tgt_seq_stop(struct seq_file *p, void *v)
00167 {
00168         return;
00169 }
00170 
00171 static void *lmv_tgt_seq_next(struct seq_file *p, void *v, loff_t *pos)
00172 {
00173         struct obd_device       *dev = p->private;
00174         struct lmv_obd          *lmv = &dev->u.lmv;
00175         ++*pos;
00176         return (*pos >= lmv->desc.ld_tgt_count) ? NULL : lmv->tgts[*pos];
00177 }
00178 
00179 static int lmv_tgt_seq_show(struct seq_file *p, void *v)
00180 {
00181         struct lmv_tgt_desc     *tgt = v;
00182 
00183         if (tgt == NULL)
00184                 return 0;
00185         seq_printf(p, "%u: %s %sACTIVE\n", tgt->ltd_idx,
00186                   tgt->ltd_uuid.uuid, tgt->ltd_active ? "" : "IN");
00187         return 0;
00188 }
00189 
00190 static const struct seq_operations lmv_tgt_sops = {
00191         .start                 = lmv_tgt_seq_start,
00192         .stop                  = lmv_tgt_seq_stop,
00193         .next                  = lmv_tgt_seq_next,
00194         .show                  = lmv_tgt_seq_show,
00195 };
00196 
00197 static int lmv_target_seq_open(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00198 {
00199         struct seq_file         *seq;
00200         int                     rc;
00201 
00202         rc = seq_open(file, &lmv_tgt_sops);
00203         if (rc)
00204                 return rc;
00205 
00206         seq = file->private_data;
00207         seq->private = PDE_DATA(inode);
00208         return 0;
00209 }
00210 
00211 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO_TYPE(lmv, uuid);
00212 
00213 struct lprocfs_vars lprocfs_lmv_obd_vars[] = {
00214         { .name =       "numobd",
00215           .fops =       &lmv_numobd_fops        },
00216         { .name =       "placement",
00217           .fops =       &lmv_placement_fops     },
00218         { .name =       "activeobd",
00219           .fops =       &lmv_activeobd_fops     },
00220         { .name =       "uuid",
00221           .fops =       &lmv_uuid_fops          },
00222         { .name =       "desc_uuid",
00223           .fops =       &lmv_desc_uuid_fops     },
00224         { NULL }
00225 };
00226 
00227 struct file_operations lmv_proc_target_fops = {
00228         .owner                = THIS_MODULE,
00229         .open                 = lmv_target_seq_open,
00230         .read                 = seq_read,
00231         .llseek               = seq_lseek,
00232         .release              = seq_release,
00233 };
00234 #endif /* CONFIG_PROC_FS */
